class.name: SVGDriver
class.documentation: The output driver produces vector graphics in the SVG format. See also the parameters for the Base Driver.

parameter.name: output_svg_logo_location
parameter.documentation: Sets where the (ECMWF) logo can be found. Possible values are 'inline'(default),'share', 'www' or 'local'.

parameter.name: output_svg_desc
parameter.documentation: Defines a text describing the content of the SVG output.

parameter.name: output_svg_meta
parameter.documentation: Defining meta data in RDF to be added to the SVG output.

parameter.name: output_svg_use_external_files
parameter.documentation: Can the SVG driver use external files for cell and image plotting. External files will reduce the SVG file size but add an external dependency!

parameter.name: output_svg_fix_size
parameter.documentation: Decides if the size is fixed in the SVG document.
